# Welcome to Personality

This module introduces you to our course in Personality Psychology. Please watch the videos and work your way through the notes. **The videos start on the next page.**  You can find the module playlist [here](https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=PLKrrdtYgOUYZ2BXy4ypzoPdA39mszdnlc). Most of the slides used to make the videos in this module can be found in the [slides repo][slides]. 

## Learning Goals

By the end of this module, you should be able to achieve all the learning goals outlined below.

* Summarize the main objectives of personality psychology.
* Understand the concept of a basic approach (or paradigm).
* Define and distinguish between the major basic approaches to personality.
* Explain Funder's first lawâ€”that great strengths are usually great weaknesses and vice versa.
* Evaluate the concept of the One Big Theory (OBT) and explain why separate approaches to personality are needed.
